scripts.deploy:netlify: NITRO_PRESET=netlify nuxi build && cd .. && npx netlify deploy
scripts.deploy:cloudflare-workers: rm -rf .nuxt && rm -rf dist && NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare nuxi build && npx wrangler publish --config wrangler-workers.toml
scripts.deploy:cloudflare-pages: rm -rf .nuxt && rm -rf dist && NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare-pages nuxi build && npx wrangler pages publish dist/ --project-name og-image-pages-demo
